channel.title: sleep on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in sleep on Barefoot Rob

item.title: today
item.description: 16:45 Friday 30 August 2019 JST Several different things on my day off today. Mostly related to work, where I realized the value of having a staging server with non-live data. “Ohhh that is right; I tested saving data as well..” when AB was like, “Um, where is the Azabujuban record?” which had been renamed to “Doraemon 5e5433a38e2b035689a75c9ed11ffb0e” Once I fixed all of those (about 8 different records) based on the old live DB which is still available at cli with mysql as root, I watched episode 3 of The Naked Director.

item.title: swapping A and P
item.description: 16:40 Saturday 30 December 2017 -02 We are going to get on the flight in several hours from now. I wonder when I will start to reverse my sleep schedule. We are 11 hours behind Tokyo, so not as far away as possible, but close. I have just gotten out my computer (to work on ConSwi) when I realized I should be sleeping.

item.title: headed to work
item.description: 07:27 Wednesday 11 October 2017 JST I just had a nap on the train while headed to Kawasaki. I’m barefoot on the train, with my computer in my lap. I will put on my shoes once I reach the building where the lesson is.
